function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Misinformation spread about the disease","Impact":"Loss of trust in public health information, leading to non-compliance with safety measures and increased virus transmission","Mitigation":"Establishing authoritative sources of information and implementing public education campaigns","Technologies":"Data analytics for identifying misinformation and social media monitoring tools","People":"General public","Owner":"Public health sector"},{"Description":"Psychological burnout and demoralization among health care workers","Impact":"Reduced capacity to provide care, increased medical errors, and high staff turnover","Mitigation":"Implementing mental health support programs, promoting work-life balance, and reducing workload through staffing adjustments","Technologies":"Telemedicine for mental health support and workload management systems","People":"Health care workers","Owner":"Health care facilities and government"},{"Description":"Challenges of health and nutrition of low-income households","Impact":"Increased vulnerability to illness, decreased productivity, and reduced quality of life","Mitigation":"Improving access to affordable health care and nutritious food, and providing financial support for low-income families","Technologies":"Mobile health clinics for community outreach and e-health platforms for virtual consultations","People":"Low-income households","Owner":"Government and non-profit organizations"}]}
